name: SV Vaihingen Handball
subtitle: The Website and API of the Handball club SV-Vaihingen, aswell as a custom tailored Content-Mangement-System

name: Bucket Map
subtitle: A IOS and Android app that enables the user to unlock new countries and save favorite places that they might want to visit again at some point

name: Bar Brawler
subtitle: A brawler game in which the player tries to survive waves of enemies in a saloon by buying new weapons and having a drink at the bar

name: Bingo App
subtitle: A student project with the goal of creating a bingo web app using React and Deno

name: Weather App
subtitle: A student project with the goal of creating a Weather App for Android using only a specific set of libraries

name: Space Invaders
subtitle: A VR game in which the player has to shoot down as many enemies as possible and at the same time not suffer too much damage by tactically using a protective shield
